billEvents.eventText: referred to consumer affairs and protection

title: Provides that no issuer of a credit card shall send unsolicited, blank checks to a card member residing in New York state
summary: Provides that no issuer of a credit card shall send unsolicited, blank checks to a credit card member residing in New York state.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the unsolicited sending of blank checks by issuers of credit cards
